caption: This pizza was okay at best. Crust was hard, but handmade and the pepperoni made it one of the greasiest pizzas we’ve ever had. Pizza is a staple in our lives and we eat it everywhere we go but won’t eat this pizza again.
Amazing New York Style Pizza and calzone, Strombolis Chef from Staten Island New York.quality Italian food . Chef made Meatballs and Italian Sausage!
Surprised by how good the pizza was.
Best pizza in the area! The husband and wife are a great duo! Will definitely be going back before we leave town! Highly recommend!

Yo! The best pizza we had in Hawaii. We were craving a taste of New York while we were away. This tasted better than any pizza we’ve had. 10/10. Highly recommend. Also, really enjoyed talking to the owners. They have high standards for their pizza!!

Usually we love Moo.  Excellent pizza and calzones.  Super disappointed tonight though.  Ordered a small cheese pizza which tasted a lot like cardboard and a calzone with bacon, pepperoni and garlic. Only thing in it was garlic. Very little of the other ingredients way more dough than usual.  So disappointed.  Only giving 4 stars based upon previous experience.  If I was rating based upon just tonight I’d give a 2.

While walking to the Airbnb we were staying at we've seen this food truck several times and we saw a sign that said they had pizza so we gave them a try. Everything is made to order and worth the wait! Yes, I'm one of those freaks that likes pineapple on a pizza so we ordered the Volcano but only with half lol my sister doesn't like it. Oh man that pizza is so good and fresh, nice amount of marinara sauce and toppings. We tried their disco fries, basically fries with gravy and and cheese over them very good.  We also got a Stromboli, the dough was perfectly cooked and delicious! I'm not a fan of marinara sauce on the side I usually pass it over to my sister cause she loves extra sauce but not this time lol, I actually ate it all. With all the food we ordered we had enough leftovers for breakfast the next day lol, this is definitely worth checking out.
